        return [((1, 1), [-arr[0]]), ((1, 1), [0]), ((0, 1), [0])]

    operations.append(((2, n), [0] * (n - 2) + [arr[-1] * (n - 1)]))
    operations.append(((1, n), list(map(lambda x: -x * n, arr))))
    return operations

        return [((1, 1), [-arr[0]]), ((1, 1), [0]), ((1, 1), [0])]
    operations = []
    operations.append(((1, n - 1), list(map(lambda x: x * (n - 1), arr[:-1]))))
    operations.append(((2, n), [0] * (n - 2) + [arr[-1] * (n - 1)]))
    operations.append(((1, n), list(map(lambda x: +x * n, arr))))
    return operations

    if n == 1:
        return [((1, 1), [-arr[0]]), ((1, 1), [0]), ((1, 1), [0])]
    operations = []
    operations.append(((1, n - 1), list(map(lambda x: x * (n - 1), arr[:-1]))))
